00031 #ifndef SNPTABLE_H
00032 #define SNPTABLE_H
00033 
00034 #include <assert.h>
00035 #include "TsvFile.h"
00036 
00037 using namespace affx;
00038 class SnpTable {
00039 
00040 public:
00041 
00042   const static int NN = -1;
00043   const static int AA = 0;
00044   const static int AB = 1;
00045   const static int BB = 2;
00046 
00055   void open(const char *fileName) {
00056     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00057     std::string snpName;
00058     std::vector<int> gTypes;
00059     tsv.open(fileName);
00060     int colCount = tsv.getColumnCount(0);
00061     tsv.bind(0,"probeset_id", &snpName);
00062     gTypes.resize(colCount - 1);
00063     /* Bind up the variables. */
00064     for(int i = 1; i < colCount; i++) {
00065       std::string s;
00066       tsv.cidx2cname(0, i, s);
00067       m_ColNames.push_back(s);
00068       tsv.bind(0, i, &gTypes[i-1]);
00069       m_ColNameMap[s] = i - 1;
00070     }
00071     int count = 0;
00072     while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00073       m_RowNames.push_back(snpName);
00074       m_GTypes.push_back(gTypes);
00075       m_RowNameMap[snpName] = count++;
00076     }
00077     tsv.close();
00078   }
00079 
00083   inline int getNumRows() { return (int)m_GTypes.size(); }
00084 
00088   inline int getNumCols() { return m_GTypes.empty() ? 0 : (int)m_GTypes[0].size(); }
00089 
00090 
00095   inline const std::string &getRowName(int rowIx) {
00096     assert(rowIx < (int)m_RowNames.size());
00097     return m_RowNames[rowIx];
00098   }
00099 
00100 
00105   inline const std::string &getColName(int colIx) {
00106     assert(colIx < (int)m_ColNames.size());
00107     return m_ColNames[colIx];
00108   }
00109 
00117   int getRowIndex(const std::string &s) {
00118     std::map<std::string, int>::iterator iter = m_RowNameMap.find(s);
00119     if(m_RowNameMap.end() == iter) 
00120       return -1;
00121     else
00122       return iter->second;
00123   }
00124 
00132   int getColIndex(const std::string &s) {
00133     std::map<std::string, int>::iterator iter = m_ColNameMap.find(s);
00134     if(m_ColNameMap.end() == iter) 
00135       return -1;
00136     else
00137       return iter->second;
00138   }
00139 
00147   int getGenotypeForSnp(int rowIndex, int colIndex) {
00148     assert(rowIndex < (int)m_GTypes.size());
00149     assert(colIndex < (int)m_GTypes[0].size());
00150     return m_GTypes[rowIndex][colIndex];
00151   }
00152 
00153 private:
00155   std::vector<std::string> m_RowNames;        
00157   std::vector<std::string> m_ColNames;
00160   std::map<std::string, int> m_RowNameMap;
00163   std::map<std::string, int> m_ColNameMap;
00165   std::vector<std::vector<int> > m_GTypes;
00166 
00167 };
00168 
00169 #endif /* SNPTABLE_H */
